DOC.brief_summary: Hemofix is a herbal formula based on traditional Jewish and far eastern medicine created to assist in wound healing and bleeding arrest. It contains herbs such as Red Clover, Liquorice, Raspberry, Ginger and more. The present study will evaluate the formula on the coagulation system.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of the Nutraceutical "Hemofix" on the Coagulation System
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers and volunteers with a mild bleeding disorder people with thrombophilic and cardiovascular complications, people who are treated with anticoagulants, women taking birth control pills people with a history hypercoagulability
